attributes.action: Freeze council tax as tough times ahead please support COVOD-19
attributes.additional_details:
To support families that are at a financial loss due to home schooling children , self employed families , small business owners .
We are all effected directly and indirectly from COVID-19.
We need complete unity 
Help each other
attributes.background:
Freeze council tax in view of the countries and worlds difficult fight financial against COVID-19
3 months to be in line with the current mortgage holiday break .
#pulltogetherasanation.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
